column4: need some help... i have just installed ubuntu on my computer but i have some issues with MBR
follow the page https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RecoveringUbuntuAfterInstallingWindows -- you can do it from the booted DVD
no matter if they are SCSI, SATA or IDE
so it might work now if i reboot?
I haven't followed the whole story, so I can't tell you
now i connected my other harddisk under install.
i am installing on /dev/sda1 as root and /dev/sda5 as swap.. what to tell grub to be root device?
maybe you have to flick the little switch on the floppy's corner
